game_description: Ever wanted to be the boss of your own company and throw the best office party? It's your time! Make money Furnish your office Hire and level up employees Don't let them escape! Hire as many employees as possible and earn as much money as you can to arrange the most fun corporate ever. Work hard, party harder! See you on the office dance floor!
review_1: Thank you for your interest in our first game!
review_2: The games ok but the main gameplay feature is just touching a keyboard are slapping employees to get them back to work. Honestly, waste of money. And I usually ramble out a six paragraph review on games but not much to say. Needs more updates to be worth the price.
review_3: The developer reached out to his followers personally and gave out 15 keys to they’re game. I wasn’t picked at first, but there was a open spot and they reached out. I just played some of the game and my little brother is playing now. We both enjoyed the game a lot and are excited to see what the game grows to.
review_4: W game bro keep up the good work
review_5: I’m trying to stop them from leaving and it won’t let me through the hallway so all of the people just leave and on the last day when I have a lot of people they all just leave because I can’t stop them because I can’t catch up to them thanks to this glich I haven’t had one good party since it’s only me at the end
